actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that the repeal of the minimum benefit shall not apply in the case of individuals who receive $300 or less per month in other benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide the minimum social security benefit amount to individuals entitled to monthly insurance benefits who receive $300 or less per month in other pension benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide that the repeal of the minimum benefit shall not apply in the case of individuals who receive $300 or less per month in other benefits.
